long_description: Offering great proteciton fron sun and blisters, the NRS Women's Boaters Gloves are ideal for any type of warm-weather paddling. With lightweight spandex backs, these gloves are cool, comfortable and quick-drying, and they provide UPF 50+ sun protection for your hands. 3/4 finger design leaves your fingers free for high-dexterity tasks such as tying knots and opening canned beverages. Synthetic leather palms provide soft comfort, a sure grip and excellent blister prevention. A fleece panel on the back of the thumb is perfect for wiping the sweat from your brow. Bike-glove style hook-and-loop closure ensures a secure fit at the wrist.
short_description: Offering great proteciton fron sun and blisters, the NRS Women's Boaters Gloves are ideal for any type of warm-weather paddling.
